summary: Wolfgang Grams, RAF terrorist, killed in a police shoot out in 1993 was thought to be part of the 1989 murder of high placed banker Alfred Herrhausen. This documentary interviews people ... See full summary »
cast: Pater Augustinus|Roswitha Bleith-Bendieck|Paul Brand|Rolf E. Breuer|Gerd Böh|Matthias Dittmer|Albert Eisenach|Irene Eisenach|Michael Endres|Thomas R. Fischer|Rainer Grams|Ruth Grams|Werner Grams|Wolfgang Grams|Wolfgang Grundmann|Alfred Herrhausen|Anna Herrhausen|Traudl Herrhausen|Helmut Kohl|Hilmar Kopper|Almut Pinckert|Kurt Rehberg|Jürgen Schneider|Winnie Wolff von Amerongen
title: Black Box BRD
